title: Error trying to buy RP
body:
Since last night I've been trying to buy rp and it keeps saying an error has occurred. This hasn't happened before either.
Anyone know of any fixes?

replies.body: Is this happening in the Beta Client or the Legacy Client? Have you tried both clients to ensure this doesn't only happen in one?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=83uaMtoB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-20T02:32:28.418+0000)
>
> Is this happening in the Beta Client or the Legacy Client? Have you tried both clients to ensure this doesn't only happen in one?

yeah, i tried both clients yesterday and today, and tried to repair, no luck :(
Can you [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) of the error so I can look into this for you? :)

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=83uaMtoB,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-21T22:54:17.197+0000)
>
> Can you [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) of the error so I can look into this for you? :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/202910294/SS_Store_Error_Try_Again_Later.jpg

I don't have a screenshot app on my computer but thats the pic on riots support website, its the same error (those steps also don't fix btw) if you need an actual picture of it tho i'll download a program and screenshot.

Thank you for all your help regardless though : )

Since you're seeing this error on both clients, this is likely caused by a network setting or Firewall blocking access to some of our store servers. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if this caused any change.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=83uaMtoB,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-22T21:31:12.373+0000)
>
> Since you're seeing this error on both clients, this is likely caused by a network setting or Firewall blocking access to some of our store servers. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are configured properly for League.
> 
> Let me know if this caused any change.

still nothing :/, maybe it'll fix itself with tomorrows patch

> [{quoted}](name=únknown SaTaN,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=83uaMtoB,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-25T09:49:19.888+0000)
>
> I am currently having the same issue i can't buy RP and i really need to because i have to gift my friend for his birthday 
> i hope you can look through this fast
> 
> 
> 
> And i would like to know why i got charged for fees if i didn't buy RP ??{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

they charged you despite getting the error?
yeah they charged me for fees only twice, and i still can't buy RP till the day

> [{quoted}](name=únknown SaTaN,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=83uaMtoB,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-27T18:39:13.490+0000)
>
> yeah they charged me for fees only twice, and i still can't buy RP till the day

try submitting a support ticket o.o thats weird

To be honest... i don't care that much about money you know money is not everything but i do care about gifting my friend for his birthday i do not usually buy RP but when i want to , I get a bug ..... now you know why other players are starting to leave league. Remember that spectator bug ?
that lasted for more than a whole patch without a fix , imagine that with every bug we are gonna get.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=83uaMtoB,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-22T21:31:12.373+0000)
>
> Since you're seeing this error on both clients, this is likely caused by a network setting or Firewall blocking access to some of our store servers. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are configured properly for League.
> 
> Let me know if this caused any change.

update - no luck on new patch either

We'll need to take a look at your system logs in order to troubleshoot this further. I'd like you to run those logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will give those logs a peek and reach back out to you.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting your ticket.
